records.Name: First Contact
records.Subject: Ebikes Reseller Opportunity
records.HtmlValue:
Dear {{{Recipient.Salutation}}} {{{Recipient.LastName}}},

I'm one of the sales reps for ebikes, an electric bikes manufacturer who builds the most wanted ebikes on the market.

Our ebikes use the latest technology and we have bikes for all pocket sizes.

We wanted to get in touch with you because we believe your dealership company would benefit from an alliance with us. If you are interested, I'll schedule a call to discuss our bikes features and pricing.

Thank you for your time.

records.Name: Check interest - first email
records.Description: Email to check in dealership interest after having explained our offerings
records.Subject: Ebikes Reseller Opportunity - Are you interested?
records.HtmlValue:
Dear {{{Recipient.Salutation}}} {{{Recipient.LastName}}},

After our discussion by phone, I reach out to you to discuss the next steps. Are you interested in partnering with us? If you have questions, don't hesitate to ask us. 

Thank you for your time.

records.Name: Check interest - second email
records.Description: Email to check in dealership interest after having explained our offerings - second attempt
records.Subject: Ebikes Reseller Opportunity - Are you interested?
records.HtmlValue:
Dear {{{Recipient.Salutation}}} {{{Recipient.LastName}}},


We haven't heard back from you and we want to make sure you received our email communication. Are you interested in partnering with us? If you have questions, don't hesitate to ask us. 

Thank you for your time.
